# Class 2 {.ct}

## Reactions and Reaction Progress {.ch}

Class 2 reviews important concepts related to chemical reactions that you are expected to know from previous courses and be able to apply.

## Learning Outcomes {.ch}

After completing Class 2 you should...

1. be able to balance a chemical reaction and state the values of the stoichiometric coefficients it contains, including their sign
2. be able to identify limiting reactants
3. be able to write expressions for the heat of reaction
4. know and be able to use different measures of composition and reaction progress
5. be able to use the extent of reaction to describe the composition of a reacting system

## Preparation Assignment {.ch} 

* Read Chapters 2 and 3 and Appendix C of [Reaction Engineering Basics](https://buffalobadger.github.io/RE_Basics/)
